dt-option.name: searchBuilder.conditions.num-fmt
dt-option.summary: An array of objects containing the conditions for the num-fmt type

type.description: An array of objects that hold the details of the conditions used for the num-fmt type.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init searchBuilder.conditions.num-fmt` option is an `-type object[]` where the objects are in the form of `-init searchBuilder.conditions[type]`.
dt-option.description:
This is useful as it allows extra num-fmt conditions to be defined that can add to the filtering options. The custom condition defined in the example will override the `=` condition in the `-type num-fmt` condition set.
More details on the structure that is used can be found at `-init searchBuilder[type]`
